author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cognex Corp Reports Qtrly GAAP EPS Of $0.21
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Cognex Corp:
* COGNEX REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 * QTRLY REVENUE INCREASED 22% FROM Q1-17
* REVENUE FOR Q2-18 IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $200 MILLION AND $210 MILLION
* QTRLY REVENUE $169.6 MILLION * QTRLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.18
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20, REVENUE VIEW $171.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21 * Q2 REVENUE VIEW $216.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
